pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahū patte sannicayaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā bahū patte sannicayaṃ karissanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.5: pattavāṇijjaṃ vā samaṇā sakyaputtiyā karissanti āmattikāpaṇaṃ vā pasāressantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.14: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, atirekapattaṃ dhāressatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.15: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.17: “Yo pana bhikkhu atirekapattaṃ dhāreyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:1.18: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato ānandassa atirekapatto uppanno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.2: Āyasmā ca ānando taṃ pattaṃ āyasmato sāriputtassa dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.14: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.16: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:2.17: “Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo. Taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.8: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā ukkaṭṭho patto majjhimo patto omako patto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.11: Ukkaṭṭho nāma patto aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.13: Majjhimo nāma patto nāḷikodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.15: Omako nāma patto patthodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.20: Nissajjitabbo saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.22: Tena bhikkhunā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.29: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyo saṃghassa nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.30: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.31: Tena bhikkhunā sambahule bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāde vanditvā tukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.38: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmassa bhikkhuno nissaggiyo āyasmantānaṃ nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.39: Yadāyasmantānaṃ pattakallaṃ, āyasmantā imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmassa bhikkhuno dadeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.40: Tena bhikkhunā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.57: Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:3.62: antodasāhaṃ adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, bhijjati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:4.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nissaṭṭhapattaṃ na denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np21:4.3: “Na, bhikkhave, nissaṭṭhapatto na dātabbo. Yo na dadeyya, āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti.
